title: Sound On: Chip Shortage, Jobs Outlook
itunes:title: Sound On: Chip Shortage, Jobs Outlook
description:
Guests: Michigan Congresswoman Haley Stevens, Gordon Gray, Director of Fiscal Policy at the American Action Forum, Bloomberg Intelligence U.S. and Canada Economist, Andrew Husby, GOP strategist and Tufts University Senior Fellow,Adam Goodman, and Bloomberg Politics contributor Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
